Fix inheritance problem of rule sets.

This uses the proper class_inheritable_accessor instead of cattr_accessor, so that the rule sets aren't inherited by subclasses.

commit_list.message:
ATV22+ always enable AC3 passthrough.

I can't find a good place that is before playback yet after the movie
is loaded to scan for AC3 tracks, so AC3 is always enabled and the sample
rate is not adjusted.  This shouldn't be a huge deal.
commit_list.repo_description: ATVFiles for Apple TV (1st generation). This project is no longer maintained.

commit_list.message:
Fix video playlist playback in ATV2.3.

This changes the playback method to popping/pushing of individual video
controllers for each entry, and in ATV21 seems to display the menu between
each entry.
commit_list.repo_description: ATVFiles for Apple TV (1st generation). This project is no longer maintained.

commit_list.message:
Implement hacky version of video playlists on ATV22/23.

Basically, since BackRow seems intent on popping the player controller as
soon as playback ends, when the file browser will activate just play the
next asset in the playlist like a normal selection, with resume disabled.

commit_list.message:
Reimplement stacking without having ot hack around to get the movie object.

Now "caches" (always is rebuilt at playback, currently) the stacked movie
as a reference movie in ~/Library/Caches/ATVFiles, and that is what is played
back.

Adds a baseMediaURL which is the old mediaURL for metadata purposes, as
mediaURL needs to return the reference movie URL now.
commit_list.repo_description: ATVFiles for Apple TV (1st generation). This project is no longer maintained.

More work for ATV2.2.

* Fix music playback to at least start playing.
* Some more stacking support in video playback.  Crashes though on finish.

commit_list.message:
ATV2.1 changed the action codes used for _postAction, so just call super in
_videoPlaybackHitEndHandler to let BackRow take care of posting the right code.

(What was 12 for stop in <2.1 is now 16, apparently.)
